personal_info.name: Satyabrata Mohanty
personal_info.professional_summary: Aspiring Software Development Engineer with a strong foundation in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object-Oriented Programming. Proficient in Java, Python, and full-stack web development, with hands-on experience in building dynamic projects and contributing to open-source communities. Passionate about solving real-world problems through scalable, clean code and actively preparing for SDE roles through competitive programming and system design exploration.

projects.title: Dev Elevate – Developer Learning & Progress Tracking Platform
bullet_points: Built a responsive platform to teach DSA, System Design, and Web Development via curated content, projects, and learning paths.
Integrated Markdown rendering, user auth, progress tracking, and SEO optimizations like rich metadata and sitemaps.

projects.title: CodeRadar – Developer Portfolio & Coding Analytics Platform
bullet_points: Built a full-stack app aggregating GitHub, LeetCode, and Codeforces data into unified profiles with DSA tracking, dashboards, and public portfolios.
Used Firebase, third-party APIs, and real-time data visualizations.

achievements.title: Platform Contribution Recognition
achievements.description: Recognized for actively contributing to the platform’s growth by answering 100+ learner queries, enhancing content clarity, and significantly improving overall learner satisfaction.

certifications.description:
Relevant coursework in Full-Stack Development.

SAtya noobada hai

bullet_points: Authored 30+ high-impact technical articles, increasing platform engagement by 15% through beginner-friendly explanations and real-world coding examples.
Collaborated with senior developers and editors to ensure technical accuracy and content alignment with the latest curriculum trends.
Contributed to the growth of the GeeksforGeeks learning community by answering 100+ queries on published content and improving learner satisfaction.
